quagga.input.subject: Re: (no subject)
quagga.input.body:
Mer Mer: I was amazed to see that they had a record of me it must have been 
when I went streaking through the RICE campus one late night. The campus 
police told me that they were the only ones with the file and that no one 
else would have access. What a complete bummer. Should I call the FBI?
